reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical after reading previous reviews about this hostel, but after staying there for two days, actually I don't think it's as bad as some people have said - just don't expect too much!!
reviews.title: Quiet, average service. Overall not bad!
Great hostel....recommended!
reviews.text: The main thing we enjoyed was the peace and quiet. There weren't many people there so we were given a dorm all to ourselves (10 bed dorm - 3 people). It was hot and stuffy, but our dorm had an aircon unit so we turned that on at night, all for no extra cost! (although not sure if they realised it was on!!). This meant we had two good night's sleeps there.

The staff were ok - I feel that they have read or been told about their indifference in the past, so they did seem to be trying to be friendly when we spoke to them! The ladies were helpful and correct with their advice. They're not the most friendly bunch you'll ever meet, but I'm not there to make friends anyway.
reviews.title: One of the Worst

reviews.text: The hostel is in a good location, 2mins walk from the bus station.
reviews.title: Dirty pool, unfriendly staff

reviews.text: The pool was a nice relief after a sweaty day walking around the falls. Also it was nearly empty every day so we had it to ourselves mostly.
reviews.title: great, clean dorms with firm mattresses

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The first impression was negative: the lady at the reception didn't pay attention to us until we actually asked her if we could check in. It was very hot and we were thirsty; having finished our water we asked if we could take a cup of water from the water dispenser that was standing there (out of politeness we asked, but most people would just go and take it). The lady then reluctantly said it was actually only for the people working there, and for the guests there was bottled water to be paid, but for this time it was ok, as the water bottles had finished. Then she gave us one tiny cup of water for the two of us. What a welcome.
reviews.title: Nice room, but quite a shabby place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had made a booking here and didn't feel like walking off in the heat with all our luggage, but we would have in other weather.
reviews.title: If you want a Double, Peter Pan is not Good Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Easy hostel. We turned up with no booking and got a dorm room. Lockers provided for security, relatively clean for a hostel, but then again, you're staying in a hostel. The social area was great, pool, cooking facilities, hammocks and generally quite spacious. Dorms are (as the lonely planet guide suggests) very stuffy in the evenings, only to be semi-cooled by a noisy fan. After a day of walking Iguazu falls, you pretty much sleep through it, though. Aimed at slightly younger crowd, but good location, decent price. Certainly manageable for a night or two. 70 pesos per person for dorm room with breakfast included (being cake, sweet croissants and coffee). Don't be offended at slightly grumpy staff, you don't have to deal with apart from check in/check out.
reviews.title: Decent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall - wouldn't recommend this hotel at al, unless you are 18 and wanting to sleep in a dorm.
reviews.title: Expensive, bad service - seemed to be better alternatives

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was pretty half-hearted, the staff couldn't care less and it was expensive. Having had a look around the town there seemed to be better options available. The hotel seemed more about making money than anything else.
reviews.title: Do not go there!

reviews.text: There was a swimming pool and the rooms were not that bad. Can get pretty noisey at night.
reviews.title: Would be great if the service was better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We reserved the private double with room with bathroom about 2 weeks ahead, and ask for reconfirm in between. When we got there it looks like no one know what are we talking about!
reviews.title: Never stay here again!!!
